title: Advanced Database Management Education Utilizing Interactive Online Tutorials

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Delivers simulation environments optimized for smartphone-based mobile learning, implementing practice-oriented interactive learning with VR elements.

learning_goals: Learners can write and execute complex SQL queries with 90% accuracy
Learners can optimize table structures by applying database normalization principles
Learners can diagnose and resolve at least five common database error scenarios in a simulated environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
